biotools.summary:
A unified platform to distinguish Klebsiella species K- and O-antigen types, model antigen structures and identify hypervirulent strains.

Klebsiella species serotype predictor and surface antigens modeler.

K-PAM (Klebsiella species serotype predictor and surface antigens modeler) is an in silico diagnostic tool that can predict the serotype of Klebsiella spp. (K- and O-types) using the gene protein sequences of proteins involved in biosynthesis and transportations of CPS and LPS.

The following documentation is to help the user in usage of K-PAM web server.
